description: A customizable side navigation component for organizing primary navigation and content areas in an application.

properties.name: collapseOnClickOutside
properties.description: Whether the side navigation should collapse when clicking outside of it.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the inner div.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Whether the side navigation is expanded.

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: Maximum width of the side navigation panel in an expanded state.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Mode to make side navigation either overlay or push the content for the selector specified in targetContent

properties.name: targetContent
properties.description: (optional) Specify the selector for the page's content for which paddings and margins will be set by side navigation based on the mode.

events.name: expandedChange
events.description: Event emitted when the expanded state changes (expanded/collapsed).

examples.basic:
The side navigation of an application provides context through accessible menu options and positions a consistent component to connect to various pages in the application.

The side navigation is a collapsible side content of the site’s pages. It is located alongside the page’s primary content. The component is designed to add side content to a fullscreen application. It is activated through the “hamburger” menu in the Navbar.
